---
category: news
title: "Synaptic metaplasticity in binarized neural networks"
excerpt: "Deep neural networks usually rapidly forget the previously learned tasks while training new ones. Laborieux et al. propose a method for training binarized neural networks inspired by neuronal metaplasticity that allows to avoid catastrophic forgetting and is relevant for neuromorphic applications."
publishedDateTime: 2021-05-05T10:23:00Z
